channel.title: Lock
channel.description:
Ok, some of your know that i host the Kaos Scape server.
I was hosting my server happily and then these 5 guys with random names, like SYIpkpker€, SYIpkpker$, and things like that but anyway. There was like 6 of the people and once they signed into my server, everything went wrong, all of a sudden there was 150 nulls on my server. Ever since this happened my server (the computer that the server is running on) has been acting strange like it has a virus on it (it dosen't). It has been freezing randomly and when i do to shut it down it just freezes and dosen't shut down. I have to shut down it manually.
EVERYONE THAT HOSTS A SERVER PLEASE! I REPEAT PLEASE! BAN THIS IP! [code]ool-18b92509.dyn.optonline.net[/code]
I have started this topic to warn people about this!
I am sorry to the vets if i have posted in the wrong section.

item.title: Lock
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

reformating refreshes ip? what a waste of time.
YOU CAN JUST RESTART ROUTER. (restarting router causes your ip to change.)
wow i learnt somthing today
THAT YOUR A DUMASS!

Read full topic

item.title: Lock
item.dc:creator: @getsome getsome
item.description:
@getsome wrote:

[quote=“xxl3th4lxx, post:3, topic:119389”]dude, WOW you don’t know anything do you

internet provider support this!? LMAO

ITS CALLED A ROUTER

and with the reformate my pc? LMAO WTF WILL THAT DO YOU DUMASS!

all that will do is clear my registery and wipe my computer (after reinstalling windows of course)
dude you are one stupid person.[/quote]

1st - This person will DDos you again if you dont shut up

2nd - If im stupid then why did i know what happened?

3th - A router HAS NOTHING to do whit your internet provider

4th - A ROUTER HAS NOTHING TO DO WHIT DDOSING U RETARD!

5th - Reformating Refreshes your IP!

6th -

[size=30pt]NOOB![/size]

item.title: Lock
item.dc:creator: @getsome getsome
item.description:
@getsome wrote:

ure are very sma…no sorry stupid

ool-18b92509.dyn.optonline.net

is a proxy server better luck next time…

and u have been ddosed lmfao owned!!!

ddos :

the master sets several zombies(dedicated senders) up then makes them send numberless connections to 1 victim making the victims connection overflood,and crash

i suggest u use no-ip adress next time and make 3 so u can random switch between them.

also if this person did get ure ip he can keep ddosing u until u ip-refresh and if ure internet provider doesnt support that u will need to reformate ure pc.

Read full topic
